parameters.query:
SELECT 
  ft.tenant_id,
  ft.user_id,
  ft.usos,
  ft.expires_at,
  tu.nombre as nombre_usuario,
  tu.telefono_whatsapp,
  tu.instancia_evolution,
  t.nombre_negocio,
  tu.rol
FROM form_tokens ft
JOIN tenant_users tu ON ft.user_id = tu.user_id
JOIN tenants t ON ft.tenant_id = t.tenant_id
WHERE ft.token = '{{ $json.token }}'::uuid
  AND ft.expires_at > NOW()
LIMIT 1;
